talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Were you looking for me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
What's taking {user_nick} so long?
Where is that slowpoke?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Accept Quest)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Ominous Signs$</html>
<html>(Remote Quest)</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
The dimensions have become highly unstable. Something bad can happen anytime.

$Velskud$
……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I have a feeling that Geraint is looking for me…)</FONT> Er… Yeah, I guess.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
Don't you have an important matter to attend to?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is there something wrong?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Where were you??
Do you know how long I've been looking for you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it the Monolith you're worried about or Velskud?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Something's wrong with my sword. See this little crack?
It cracked a little in my dream and I woke up to find a crack at the exact same spot.
And I realised that Velskud's aura on the sword has become fainter.
I'm worried if he's doing he's job in protecting the Monolith.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I know you care about him deep inside.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
O-of course it's the Monolith I'm worried about!
Who would care about that arrogant dragon…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You should go there and check on him yourself if you're so worried.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
No way!
I'm just worried that he might destroy the Monolith.
You know what Argenta had to do to protect that place… and I don't trust a hooligan like him!
The dream I had is making me uneasy too…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then shall I go and take a look?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Why should I?
I'm gonna concentrate on finding Rubinart.
To hell with Velskud.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But where is Velskud?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Oh, would you do that?
Go and see if the gloomy whiner is doing his job.
If there is even a single crack in the Monolith's forcefield, I'll have him accountable.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I hope there's someone I could ask…</html>
<html>Could he be at the Monolith?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Hmm…
I don't know. He always does whatever he wants.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How can Priestesses of Darkness know where he is?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
You're the only one who has connections with dragons.
Oh, I know. Maybe Priestesses of Darkness know where he is.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I guess I have no choice.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
You don't know? Well…
Nevermind, it's too complicated to explain. Anyways, if you can't find Velskud, try asking one of the Priestesses.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're right, I didn't think of that.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
By the way, can you get to the Monolith yourself?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I should meet a Priestess right now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
If I remember it correctly,
Priestesses of Darkness can control the gaps in dimensions.

$Geraint$
Aren't you going to check on Velskud?
If there is a problem in the Monolith, we're doomed.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
The dimensions have become highly unstable. Something bad can happen anytime.

$Velskud$
……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What a coincidence. I was thinking of getting your help too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
{user_nick}, I've been looking for you for an urgent matter.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a82424>(I have a bad feeling about this.)</FONT><FONT color=#2b2723> I was looking for Velskud too.</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
Velskud has been looking for you for quite some time now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh no! Where is Velskud?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
The time and space dimensions of Lagendia are becoming more and more unstable.
He wanted to hear from you to see if anything happened in Mistland.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Stop what?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
Then he left in a hurry to stop the oncoming waves in the Monolith.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You must be talking about the <FONT color=#a82424>Monolith</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
{user_nick}, as you know, Argenta has entrusted Velskud with her guardian's duties.
Velskud has taken on several responsibilities to protect Lagendia and his most crucial job is protecting and watching over an important place.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
That's right. Monolith, the passageway that links Lagendia with other worlds.
Argenta guarded that place because of her duties to protect Lagendia.
And there was another similar place she had to protect--Garden of Time and Space.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I didn't realise Garden of Time and Space was such an important place.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
The Guardian Dragon had to safeguard Lagendia from all the existing threats and Nests were one of them.
Garden of Time and Space was created so as to control and watch over the Nests from a single place.
Though Nests are scattered all over the world, suspicious changes can be detected quickly through the Garden.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>In both of them? That sounds bad.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
Both Velskud and Argenta are not much of a talker so I guess you've never heard about it from them.
Anyway, Velskud had to keep his eyes on both the Monolith and Garden of Time and Space.
Then some problems occurred in both of those places.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What?!!! The <FONT color=#a82424>force field</FONT>?? Has it been destroyed?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
Yes, it's bad. We're currently investigating on them.
First, strange energy was detected in the Garden of Time and Space and afterwards, intruders broke in to the Monolith.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But I can't stay here and do nothing. I'll help Velskud with whatever I can.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
We don't know about that yet.
We just have to wait until Velskud comes back.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thank you. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(I hope Velskud is all right.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
{user_nick}…
I'm sure you'll be of much help to Velskud.
I'll open the gap in dimensions and send you to the Monolith.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
The dimensions have become highly unstable. Something bad can happen anytime.

$Geraint$
I'll keep looking for Rubinart so you go and check on Velskud.

$Velskud$
……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Please send me to Velskud now.</html>
<html>Wait, I have something to do before I go.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
You have to enter the Monolith alone.
Please check again if you have other urgent matters to attend to.

$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
I hope you can hurry.
Velskud definitely can use your help, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
I will open the gap of dimensions now.
You will be sent directly to the Monolith.

$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
You know you cannot go to the Monolith with other people.
Please talk to me again when you're alone.

* You have to enter the Monolith alone.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
The dimensions have become highly unstable. Something bad can happen anytime..

$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
Have you met Velskud at the Monolith?

$Geraint$
I'll keep looking for Rubinart so you go and check on Velskud.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What's going on? What's happening here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
What are YOU doing here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Tell me! There's something wrong with the <FONT color=#a82424>Monolith's force field</FONT>, isn't it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'm not obliged to explain every single detail to you.
The fact that you're a dimwit who can hardly understand what I say just increases my unwillingness to waste my breath.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then what is a <FONT color=#a82424>Low Child</FONT> doing in the Monolith?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Watch your mouth! Monolith's force field still stands strong.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There were no signs of this in Mistland.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Do I need to teach you everything? Know your place.
Besides, I'm not the one you should be demanding an explanation from.
You should go to the wimpy dragon kid for this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh no… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Is this all because of me?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
If you did your job, this wouldn't have happened.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm certain there were no such signs.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You don't even have an excuse for this situation.
Nevermind, trash. You really didn't know Childs were entering the Monolith from Mistland?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm sorry.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
What were you doing, letting things escalate to this state?
You're always so… stupid and annoying.
So you really don't know anything about this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh right, you said the force field hasn't been broken. Then how come the Childs are here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'm not expecting an apology here.
Anyway, how did the Childs enter the Monolith when there's nothing wrong with the force field……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'm still investigating on this but I've found something weird.
I can feel a hint of Red Dragon's energy from all the Childs who have been intruding the Monolith.
(Could it be Rubinart's magic…?)
Still no news of Red Dragon?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Could something have happened to Rubinart? What should we do now?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You'd want to hurry after seeing the situation here for yourself.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Please, Rubinart could be in danger!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Geraint will take care of Mistland's matters.
I have no responsibility to look after an incapable baby dragon.
Protecting Lagendia is all that I care about.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If you can sense Rubinart's magic, then doesn't it mean he's in danger?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I don't care about him.
No, I'll just say that I may help him out once or twice if the situation is really bad……
Damn, I've grown so soft.
(Is it because of the Dragon's Jewel I got from Argenta? To hell with her useless sentimentality.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh right. So that means… Rubinart must be fine.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Don't worry. A vague hint of Rubinart's magic is all I can detect from the Childs.
It's so slight that you wouldn't notice it unless you're a dragon.
Even you, who have half his jewel, can't notice it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Absolutely. He's working so hard on it right now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I can't say that for sure. But if you didn't feel anything wrong with half of his jewel, I guess he is safe.
But I don't think it's a good thing that his magic can be felt here.
If Geraint doesn't find Rubinart in time, things may get worse.
Is that little kid doing his job?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I didn't know you were capable of saying such nice words.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'll acknowledge his effort.
Both yours and his.
(That sounded like the Guardian Dragon again…) Ehem. I've been talking too much.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Garden of Time and Space?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Cut that crap, {user_nick}.
Now, enough with the useless chitchat.
I can feel something going on at Garden of Time and Space. I should go and take a look.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm gonna cancel what I just said about you being capable of saying nice things.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'm busy so don't bother me.
This is not the first time a Child was spotted in the Monolith or suspicious energy was detected in the Garden of Time and Space.
If I don't hurry, it might become catastrophic. You got that?
Now stop being a nuisance and get lost.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh? Er… You're welcome. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Wow he just said thanks. Maybe he has changed a little.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
…But thanks for your help just now, kid.

$Velskud$
I think I've told you enough.
Stop bothering me.

$Priestess of Darkness Mocha$
Low Childs have been attacking the Monolith recently.
Velskud has been fighting them off all alone.

$Geraint$
Monolith now has Childs?
No way!
Rubinart said the force field will not break……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Me? Where is Velskud?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
{user_nick}, I've been waiting for you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did something happen again?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Velskud is checking on a suspicious energy right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Nests? That's bad!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Investigations are still in progress so it's hard to tell what it exactly is.
All I can tell you is that some Nests linked to the Garden of Time and Space are showing abnormal signs.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So suspicious energy is being spotted not only in Nests but in other places too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Velskud will identify the cause soon.
Suspicious energy was spotted in various places lately and we're in need of further investigation.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Forest of Little Shadow? You mean the one in <FONT color=#a82424>Anu Arendel</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
That's right.
Although there were no signs of trouble yet, we should still investigate
since similar energy was detected in Forest of Little Shadow. Can I leave that to you, {user_nick}?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it because Anu Arendel is the Monolith's entrance?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
By right, Velskud would have gone there himself but he's too busy at the Nests now.
What bothers me is that the place is Anu Arendel.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>All right, I'll go and take a look.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Yes. We should be careful since Childs are attacking the Monolith.
We should be wary of even the slightest sign of suspicious activity.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Quest Completed)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is there something wrong with that place too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
The energy detected from that place isn't strong so I hope it's nothing grave.
Oh, and one more thing.
Please investigate Gates of Darkness too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I understand why you're so worried.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
That place is known to be highly unstable.
Even the Garden of Time and Space which is under the Guardian Dragon's watch is showing problems so I'm worried about the rest of the places.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I will.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
I'll leave it to you then.
Please come back to me when you're done with the investigation.

journal.title: Geraint's Worries
journal.contents:
You somehow have a feeling that Geraint is looking for you. Find Geraint.

Merca's Heart - Geraint

journal.title: Velskud's Whereabouts
journal.contents:
Geraint told you about an ominous dream. Ask Priestess of Darkness Mocha in Saint Haven about Velskud's whereabouts.

Saint Haven - Priestess of Darkness Mocha
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Mocha
journal.todo_msg: Go to Saint Haven and talk to Priestess of Darkness Mocha.

journal.title: To Monolith
journal.contents:
Ask Priestess of Darkness Mocha to open a gap in dimensions so that you can go to the Monolith.

Saint Haven - Priestess of Darkness Mocha
journal.todo_msg: Go to Monolith with Priestess of Darkness Mocha's help.

journal.title: Met Velskud
journal.contents:
Talk to Velskud who is somewhere in the Monolith.

Monolith - Velskud

journal.title: What happened at Garden of Time and Space
journal.contents:
Follow Velskud who has made his way to Garden of Time and Space after sensing something.

Garden of Time and Space - ??
journal.destination: Go to Garden of Time and Space
journal.todo_msg: Go to Garden of Time and Space.
